question: As of April 2020, the investment made by which company is the largest foreign direct investment (FDI), for minority investment in India?
explanation:
Major Technology company Facebook has recently announced an investment of Rs. 43,574 crores in Jio Platforms, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Reliance Industries Limited.
This investment will enable Facebook acquire a 9.9 stake in Jio platforms. This is claimed to be the largest foreign direct investment for minority stake in the country. A partnership agreement was also made among Jio Platforms, Reliance Retail Limited and WhatsApp to boost JioMart platform through WhatsApp and support small businesses on WhatsApp.
